title: QA Engineer
description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.
   

  

 We're on the lookout for QA Engineers who see testing as more than checking features. You understand that the purpose of testing is to make risks visible and reduce uncertainty, and you care about improving not only the product but also how the team ensures quality.
   

  

 You enjoy methodical, structured testing, but you’re equally curious about automation and how to make testing smarter, faster, and better integrated into the delivery flow.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* A chance to work on unique projects that explore and push the boundaries of what's possible.
* A fun and fair work environment where your you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
* A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
* Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


 As a QA Engineer at Umain, your role will involve:
   

  

* Analysing user stories and requirements to identify risks and define test cases
* Design, execute, and maintain functional, regression, and exploratory tests
* Build and extend automated tests for UI, API, or backend
* Collaborate with developers to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines
* Report and communicate quality insights, focusing on what the results mean
* Suggest and implement improvements in testing practices, tools, and processes


 What you bring
   

  

*Structured and analytical testing skills*
* Strong understanding of structured and risk-based test design, drawing on principles from frameworks such as ISTQB or TMAP
* Experience across different test levels including component, integration, system, and UAT
* Ability to design, prioritise, and maintain test cases based on business impact and risk


*Automation and technical mindset*
* Hands on experience with modern automation tools such as Cypress, Playwright, Appium or Postman
* Comfortable writing basic scripts in JavaScript, TypeScript, or Python
* Understanding of APIs, JSON, and CI/CD pipelines such as GitLab, Azure DevOps, or Jenkins
* Treats automation as part of the product codebase, versioned, reviewed, and maintained


*Collaboration and communication*
* Works closely with developers, designers, and product owners to clarify and test assumptions early
* Communicates findings clearly and constructively, focusing on understanding and action
* Helps stakeholders make informed release decisions by putting risks into context


*Ownership and continuous improvement*
* Takes initiative to improve how the team works instead of waiting for others to define it
* Brings ideas for smarter ways of testing or automating repetitive work
* Contributes to making quality a shared team responsibility


*Experience we’d love to see*
* 3 to 6 years of experience in QA, test engineering, or a similar quality focused role
* Experience working in agile, iterative delivery environments such as Scrum or Kanban
* Exposure to end to end digital product development across web, mobile, or backend systems
* Experience from consultancy or multi client projects is a plus
* Fluent in English; other languages are an advantage


 Why Umain?
   

  

* Career Framework: We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.
* Work-Life Balance: At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.
* Innovations and Learning: Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.
* Skills Over Degrees: We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.


**Are You Ready to Shape, Ship, and Scale with Us?**
 If you're a QA Engineer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.
   

  

 Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.
   

  

 We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

title: AWS Data Engineer
description:
**Job Description:**




  





 For this client, we are growing our Data & Analytics footprint. As our new Senior Data Engineer, you will collaborate with product owners, architects and other key profiles across the global organisation helping business verticals and clusters maximising the value of our data and drive business change as an impact of this.
 



  





 You will be responsible for delivering value-add products, ensuring high success rates as well as being an ambassador that data quality is always a priority. Your primary focus will be designing, building and implementing scalable data products on our global data platform and securing ownership and stability of the products.
 



  





**Qualifications and Skills:**




  





 The tech stack needed is:
 


* Data Engineering
* Experience using an IDE for ETL
* Python
* SQL
* Cloud (AWS)
* Big Data Tech
* Data Modelling & Data Warehouse experience
* Experience working within scrum and in an agile team



  





 Preferably you would be someone with strong experience in ETL processes and data pipelines.
 



  





 If you are interested in learning more please apply today!!
 



  





 To find out all other details, please apply below! We look forward to receiving your application.

title: Azure Cloud Architect
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   

  

 At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for Cloud Data Architect for our Cloud Infrastructure team.
   

  

**What You Bring**
* Design, implement, and manage scalable, secure, and highly available Azure cloud infrastructures.
* Design end-to-end Azure-based data architectures including ingestion, storage, processing, and consumption layers.
* Build and maintain virtual networks, subnets, firewalls, route tables, VPN gateways, and ExpressRoute.
* Develop and manage Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, following GitOps principles.
* Collaborate with application and security teams to ensure optimal network configurations and cloud architecture.
* Monitor and troubleshoot Azure resources, ensuring high availability and performance.
* Implement best practices for cloud governance, cost optimization, security, and compliance.


**Nice to have**
* Create and manage CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps for infrastructure provisioning and application deployment
* Secure handling of credentials and secrets using GitHub Secrets and environment variables.
* Implementing Git flos, trunk-based development, or feature branching for collaborative development
* Managing code versions for data pipelines, infrastructure templates, and notebooks.

title: Integration Engineer
description:
*Bankgirot har en unik ställning på Sveriges betalmarknad som nu genomgår den största transformationen i modern tid. Arbetet med att utveckla framtidens betalinfrastruktur är i full gång och vi behöver dig som vill vara en del av resan. Nu söker vi tre drivna personer som vill vara med och implementera, bygga och förvalta vår nya integrationsplattform.*
**Din roll**
 Som Integration Engineer på Bankgirot kommer du tillsammans med ditt team implementera och förvalta vår nya integrationsplattform. Teamet är nytt hos oss och kommer bestå av en Tech Lead och tre Engineers och har ett tydligt uppdrag att stärka Bankgirots integrationsförmåga. Arbetet omfattar både integrationer i low-code-plattformen och traditionell programmering där programmeringsgraden varierar beroende på projektens behov. Tillsammans med Tech Lead bidrar du till målbilden för integrationsområdet och etablerar best practices för plattformens användning.
   

  

 I ditt arbete utgår du från Center for Enablement där fokus ligger på att säkerställa gemensamma arbetssätt genom att arbeta nära projekt och värdeströmmar. På så vis bidrar teamet proaktivt genom att ge andra team verktyg och kompetens att själva driva integrationsarbetet på ett effektivt sätt. Rollen är central i Bankgirots tekniska transformation och ger utrymme att påverka både riktning och arbetssätt framåt.
   

  

**Vad vi söker**
 Vi söker flera Engineers där grad av senioritet kan variera. Oavsett nivå av senioritet är du driven, analytiskt och kommunikativ. För en mer junior profil behöver du ha minst två års erfarenhet av att arbeta med integration. För en mer senior profil söker vi dig med minst fem års erfarenhet av integration, gärna inom regulatorisk verksamhet eller finanssektorn. Vi ser även gärna att du har erfarenhet av migreringsprojekt från äldre Mainframe-system till nya integrationsplattformar.
   

  

 Gemensamt för tjänsterna:
   

  

  

* Erfarenhet av integrationsplattformar som Frends, MuleSoft, IBM, Microsoft Azure API Management eller Google Apigee.
* Har en förståelse för modern integrationsteknik.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Kafka, SFTP, API-miljöer, Grafana, Docker och Kubernetes.
* Är bekväm med low-code och drag-and-drop lösningar men har även erfarenhet av programmering i språk som C#, Python, GO (Golang) eller SQL.
* Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att utveckla i Open Source-miljöer med React, Java och PostgreSQL.


**Ett utvecklande arbete med bra förmåner**
 På Bankgirot stöttar vi varandra och firar framgångar tillsammans. Vi tror att när människor mår bra och har balans i livet så levererar vi vårt allra bästa. Därför satsar Bankgirot stort på hälsa, välmående och generösa förmåner som bidrar till både trivsel och hållbarhet i arbetslivet.
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Bankgirot med Ants Tech Recruiters. Vid frågor eller funderingar, kontakta Ellika Ulltin på ellika.ulltin@ants.se eller 072-230 00 28. Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att ansöka redan idag. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Du behöver ha goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska. Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper i den här rekryteringen. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning baserad i Liljeholmen i Stockholm.
   

  

 Innan anställning beslutas genomförs en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) om tjänsten innebär arbete med säkerhetsklassade uppgifter eller säkerhetskänslig verksamhet.
   

  

 Bankgirot är ett svenskt clearinghus och teknikbolag med över 60 års erfarenhet av att leverera finansiell infrastruktur till banker. I samverkan med betalsektorn ser vi till att privatpersoner och företag enkelt kan göra överföringar och betalningar. Bankgirot säkerställer att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar felfritt, samtidigt som vi utvecklar framtidssäkrade lösningar. Vi säkrar och utvecklar Sveriges betalningar.
   

  

 Läs mer på www.bankgirot.se

title: Software Engineer
description:
**If you want to work with automation at scale, build tools that internal teams rely on daily, and solve real, impactful engineering problems across hardware and software, this is the right place!** 




  





**ABOUT US** 




 Toptracer Technologies have users and viewers all over the world. Our mission is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by tracing contributions to TV and gamification to ranges. Our range technology is used in 33 countries and the broadcast is aired over 270 times yearly. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our R&D office in Danderyd, Stockholm.
 



  





**THE TEAM** 




 Our mission is to systematically automate and orchestrate range systems at scale, enabling internal teams to operate thousands of servers with high reliability and minimal manual intervention.
 



  





 We build and maintain the tooling that makes this possible — from provisioning software to monitoring large, distributed environments — ensuring that our ranges run efficiently, predictably, and with strong observability.
 



  





 Take the chance to leave your mark on the software architecture of an innovative tech company in a unique part of the tech field, in a team with diverse expertise who are passionate about building smart software.
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 The team is now looking for a Software Engineer. With a broad background in software development, you will be driving technical decisions within the team and taking an active part in the company’s overall architectural and strategic discussions around ensuring scalability and enabling growth. Day-to-day you will be writing code with the team.
 



  





**HOW WE WORK** 




 Weekly pair/mob programming sessions for alignment and shared decision-making.
 



 Regular demos to stakeholders to gather feedback early.
 



 Pull requests shared in team chat for quick review loops.
 



 Technical decisions discussed and agreed upon in mob sessions.
 



 A dedicated third-line support rotation for daily operational support.
 



  





**TECH STACK FOCUS** 




 Kubernetes platform with thousands of clusters
 



 Python for backend and general application development
 



 Developing for Linux environments
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Develop and maintain tools that orchestrate and manage thousands of range systems.
* Ensure servers can be provisioned, configured, and managed effortlessly, supported by robust internal tooling.
* Build and evolve monitoring and observability tools that give real-time insight into software running across all ranges.
* Provide release management and regression test environments relied on by many internal teams.
* Work closely with hardware-adjacent software (servers, screens, cameras) and Linux-based environments
* And of course, playing golf!



  





**WE BELIEVE YOU HAVE** 



* Experience in backend programming with Python
* Experience in building Kubernetes platforms
* Several years of developing for Linux environments
* Several years of experience and a highly collaborative mindset.
* Great knowledge sharing and have strong abilities in coaching the other team members in order for the team to best solve technical challenges that are presented to them, together.
* Experience in deploying and maintaining cloud-based and distributed systems
* Understanding of large systems and how different components integrate



  





**What Makes This Role Unique** 




 Most companies manage a handful of servers — we manage thousands. The challenge and reward lie in building systems that reliably orchestrate massive, distributed environments. You’ll work on tools that power release workflows, regression testing, and large-scale automated deployments used across the entire organization. If you want to work with automation at scale, build tools that internal teams rely on daily, and solve real, impactful engineering problems across hardware and software, this is the right place.
 



  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




  





 We value fully engaged associates that come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range nearby your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, One Team, Fun, Excellence and Edgy Spirit. If you want to learn more about them visit: Core Values | Topgolf.
 



  





**Activities** 



* Morning Fikas
* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Danderyd. Hit the link at the bottom of the page to read more about the team. We hope to hear from you soon!
 



  





**Social media:** 




 https://vimeo.com/339546469
 



 https://www.toptracer.com/
 



 https://careers.toptracer.com
 



 https://www.instagram.com/toptracer/?hl=sv

title: Careerbooster Stockholm
description:
**Om rollen**
 Kickstarta din karriär inom IT-branschen. Via vårt trainee-program Sogeti Careerbooster, boostat av Gen AI, tar du dig in i IT-branschen med raketfart, skruvar din expertis åt rätt håll och säkrar en anställning på Sogeti.
   

  

 Sogeti Careerbooster har rankats som ett av Sveriges mest eftertraktade trainee-program både 2025, 2024, 2023 och 2022. Vad är det då som gör det så intressant för många? Här kommer de största anledningarna till det:
   

  

* Vårt trainee-program är en kostnadsfri intensivutbildning på 24 veckor som specifikt har utformats för att ge dig en raketstart på din karriär inom IT:s hetaste områden.
* I programmet kombineras praktiskt arbete med teoretisk fördjupning. Du arbetar direkt i kunduppdrag, där du får omsätta dina kunskaper i praktiken.
* Del av tiden vigs åt gemensamma studier och workshops tillsammans med övriga traineer, där ni fördjupar er i framtidens tekniker inom data och AI, inklusive Generativ AI. Detta upplägg ger dig en oslagbar kombination av det som är relevant för marknaden. Vi ger dig vår erfarenhet och spetskompetens.
* Du får stöd av seniora sogetiare och du har ett anställningskontrakt vid start.


 Vi väljer löpande ut heta områden inom IT till trainee-programmet. Kommande spår är Data Engineer & AI Engineer. Genom att integrera generativ AI får du dessutom en djupare förståelse för hur AI kan automatisera och optimera processer, skapa intelligenta lösningar och driva innovation. Med den kunskapen öppnas nya möjligheter − en riktigt stark fördel i karriären.
   

  

 Läs mer om vad du lär dig här: Spår Data Engineer & AI Engineer.
   

  

**Din bakgrund**
* Du har antingen nyligen avslutat/kommer att avsluta dina studier eller har arbetat något år i IT-branschen.
* Du har universitets- eller högskoleutbildning inom IT, datavetenskap, AI och/eller statistik, eller motsvarande.
* Du har erfarenhet av programmering, exempelvis Python. Meriterande är kunskap inom SQL.
* Utbildning inriktad på data. T.ex. dataanalys, datascience och/eller statistik. Med intresse för logik och problemlösning.
* Du är driven, villig att lösa problem och nyfiken på allt nytt som händer just inom data.


 Vi lägger också stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper i vår antagningsprocess. Dessa egenskaper är lika viktiga som den tekniska förståelsen, eftersom du kommer att arbeta inom konsultbranschen där driv, nyfikenhet, mod och engagemang är avgörande för att lyckas och trivas i rollen. Har du viljan och intresset, är kommunikativ, duktig på att bygga relationer, anpassar dig snabbt och älskar att lösa problem? Då är konsultrollen perfekt för dig! Med rätt stöd och coachning kan vi hjälpa dig att utvecklas och nå din fulla potential.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Sogeti Careerbooster #1, 2026 kommer att pågå mellan den 2 mars och den 30 september (med ledighet i juli). Vi behöver din ansökan senast den 31 januari, 2026. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan idag, urval sker löpande! Vill du veta mer? Kontakta Jonas Jaani vår Sogeti Careerbooster Lead så berättar han gärna mer.
   

  

 Epost: jonas.jaani@sogeti.se
   

  

 Tel: 070-298 52 63
   

  

 LinkedIn
   

  

*Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess kommer identitetskontroll att genomföras genom granskning av ditt ID-kort, och bakgrundskontroller kan utföras vid behov.*
 Om Sogeti
   

  

 Sogeti Sverige, en del av Capgemini-koncernen, med 19 kontor och 1200 medarbetare, skapar affärsvärde med teknologi för organisationer som behöver införa innovation snabbt och som vill ha en lokal partner med global skalbarhet. Med en hands-on-kultur och närhet till kunderna, implementerar Sogeti lösningar som hjälper organisationer att arbeta snabbare, bättre och smartare. Genom att kombinera agilitet och snabb implementation via en DevOps-ansats, levererar Sogeti innovativa lösningar inom test- och kvalitetssäkring, molnet och systemutveckling, förstärkta av AI, data och automation.

title: Platform Engineer - Developer Experience
description:
**TL;DR** 
 We are seeking a Platform Engineer to enhance and scale Lovable's developer experience. In this role, you will be responsible for critical components of our stack, ensuring our engineering workflows are faster, smoother, and more
 **Lovable** 
 .
   

  

**Why Lovable?**
 Lovable lets anyone and everyone build software with plain English. From solopreneurs to Fortune 100 teams, millions of people use Lovable to transform raw ideas into real products - fast. We are at the forefront of a foundational shift in software creation, which means you have an unprecedented opportunity to change the way the digital world works. Over 2 million people in 200+ countries already use Lovable to launch businesses, automate work, and bring their ideas to life. And we’re just getting started.
   

  

 We’re a small, talent-dense team building a generation-defining company from Stockholm. We value extreme ownership, high velocity and low-ego collaboration. We seek out people who care deeply, ship fast, and are eager to make a dent in the world.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
* You have strong programming skills and a track record of improving developer velocity and system reliability.
* 7+ years of experience working in a platform team supporting developer experience (o11y, CI/CD, application frameworks, productivity tooling, etc).
* You’ve written code and tools to support growing engineering orgs in scale-ups.
* You have experience with Docker, Kubernetes and modern infrastructure practices.
* You’re a problem-solver who thrives on challenges and ships high-leverage systems fast.
* You’re comfortable navigating ambiguity and solving problems as they arise.
* You care about security, stability, and speed and know when to make trade-offs between them.
* You’re based in Stockholm or ready to relocate - this is an on-site, 5-days-a-week role.


**What You’ll Do**
**In one sentence:** 
 Own and scale the developer experience at Lovable, making our engineering teams the most productive in the world.
   

  

* Bring order and structure to our code base.
* Integrate or build application frameworks to support a growing engineering organization and code footprint
* Own and develop our observability stack, from code instrumentation through ingestion to presentation.
* Integrating tools for AI driven development.
* Identify and drive reliability improvement efforts across all engineering teams.


**Our tech stack**
 We're building with tools that both humans and AI love. Lovable platform engineers are capable of working across the whole stack. Examples of tech in our stack include:
   

  

* Frontend: React and Typescript.
* Backend: Golang and Rust.
* Cloud: Cloudflare, GCP, AWS, Modal.
* Data: Clickhouse, Firestore, Spanner, BigQuery.
* DevOps Tooling: CI/CD pipelines, OTEL, Grafana, kubernetes, terraform.
* Local Tooling: Nix, DevEnv.


 And always on the lookout for what's next!
   

  

**About Your Application**
* Please submit your application in English - it’s our company language so you’ll be speaking lots of it if you join
* We treat all candidates equally - if you’re interested please apply through our careers portal

title: Forskningsingenjörer inom vetenskapliga generativa agenter
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Vi söker en forskningsingenjör som kan arbeta heltid med osäkerheter i LLM-baserade vetenskapliga agenter.
   

  

 I projektet kommer du att
   

  

* identifiera potentiella källor till osäkerheter i AI-agenter,
* undersöka sätt att bedöma kvaliteten på osäkerhetsuppskattningar med standardmetoder för LLM, och
* utveckla ett riktmärke för osäkerhetskvantifiering i LLM-baserade vetenskapliga agenter.


 Projektet kommer att genomföras under ledning av Martin Trapp och Hossein Azizpour, och du kommer att delta i regelbundna gruppmöten. Under projektet kommer dessutom en vetenskaplig endagsworkshop med ledande internationella forskare och samarbetspartners att planeras och hållas, där delresultat kommer att presenteras. Dessutom kommer resultaten att behöva presenteras vid EECS Research and Impact Day sommaren 2026.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Krav**
* Avlagd examen på grundnivå eller avancerad nivå (högskoleutbildning) inom ämnet för anställningen eller motsvarande kompetens.
* Erfarenhet av djupinlärning och verktyg för maskininlärning.
* Fördjupad kunskap om LLM och Transformer-arkitekturer
* Utmärkta programmeringskunskaper i PyTorch/JAX och erfarenhet av att arbeta med GPU:er och högpresterande kluster.
* Starka matematiska kunskaper med utmärkt förståelse för statistik (t.ex. hypotesprövning, bayesiansk statistik)
* God samarbetsförmåga, självständighet och kritiskt tänkande.


**Meriterande**
* Djupgående erfarenhet av LLM-agenter
* Erfarenhet av osäkerhetskvantifiering i LLM
* Erfarenhet av Bayesian deep learning
* Erfarenhet av Deep Generative Models
* Erfarenhet av att genomföra storskaliga experiment
* Medvetenhet om mångfalds- och likabehandlingsfrågor med särskild fokus på jämställdhet.


 Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Bli en del av KTH
   

  

 KTH formar framtiden genom utbildning, forskning och innovation. Som ett ledande internationellt tekniskt universitet spelar vi en aktiv roll i att driva och medverka i omställningen till ett hållbart samhälle. Här erbjuds du möjligheten att växa och utvecklas på en kreativ och dynamisk arbetsplats med goda arbetsvillkor och förmåner. Jämställdhet, mångfald och lika villkor är en kvalitetsfråga och en självklar del av KTH:s värdegrund som universitet och statlig myndighet.
   

  

 Läs mer om våra förmåner och hur det är att arbeta och utvecklas på KTH.
   

  

 Fackliga representanter
   

  

 Kontaktuppgifter till fackliga representanter.
   

  

 Ansökan
   

  

 Du ansöker via KTH:s rekryteringssystem. Du som sökande har huvudansvaret för att din ansökan är komplett när den skickas in.
   

  

**Ansökan Ska Innehålla**
* CV med information om relevant erfarenhet (på engelska).
* Kort redogörelse för hur din praktiska erfarenhet är relevant för projektet och varför du vill söka denna tjänst (max 1 sida, på engelska).


 Ansökan ska vara KTH tillhanda senast sista ansökningsdagen vid midnatt, CET/CEST (CentralEuropean Time/Central European Summer Time).
   

  

 Om anställningen
   

  

 Anställningen gäller tidsbegränsat enligt avtal - i upp till 6 mån, med tillträde enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Övrigt
   

  

 För information om behandling av personuppgifter i samband med rekrytering.
   

  

 Det kan förekomma att en anställning hos KTH är placerad i säkerhetsklass. Om så är fallet för just denna anställning görs en säkerhetsprövning av sökande i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) efter samtycke. I dessa fall är en förutsättning för anställning att sökande blir godkänd efter säkerhetsprövning.
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av platsannonser.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description:
**About Us**
 Legora is on a mission: to redefine how legal work gets done. From the very start we have been very clear about the fact that we are not building a solution for lawyers, we are building it with them, because it is the only way to make sure it gets done the right way; working side-by-side every step of the way.
   

  

 Our AI-native workspace empowers legal professionals not just to work faster - but to ask better questions, unlock new insights. Every day, we push the boundaries of legal tech to make complex processes smarter, faster, and more human. From thousands of documents analysed in minutes to intelligent workflows designed in collaboration with leading practices, we’re turning possibility into reality.
   

  

 Today we are trusted by global firms like Cleary Gottlieb, Goodwin, Bird & Bird and Linklaters in over 40 countries, but we have no plans on stopping here. We ship fast, we iterate effectively, and we scale rapidly - not by accident, but by design.
   

  

 When you join Legora, you become part of a team that believes "good enough" isn’t good enough and that the way to win is together, by empowering lawyers to do their best work with technology that truly understands them. If you’re excited by building from first principles, working with exceptional people, and accelerating change in a high-stakes, high-impact domain—then this is the moment and the place.
   

  

**We’re not just shaping the future of legal tech — we’re defining it. Ready to join us in building the intelligent future of law?**
**The role**
 As a Full-stack Engineer at Legora you will build, review and ship amazing products helping legal professionals all over the world in their day-to-day job. You’ll get the chance to work across the entire tech stack with clear ownership and autonomy.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Architect and implement features end-to-end for our web platform
* Take ownership of our codebase, balancing high-quality code, security and speed of development
* Work with technologies such as React, Node.js, AWS, Azure and Kubernetes
* Drive continuous improvement and challenge us, the industry and yourself


**Who You Are**
* A passionate engineer with a few years of experience building great products using cutting-edge technologies
* You feel comfortable working across the entire tech stack, with focus on backend development
* You’re autonomous and take pride in the code you write
* You’re a problem solver who’s not afraid to come up with creative solutions and think holistically about software architecture
* Experience in infrastructure and integrations are a big plus


**Legora is an Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Legora, we believe great teams are built on diversity of thought and experience. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer and committed to creating an inclusive, high-performance culture where everyone can do their best work. We welcome people of all backgrounds and don’t discriminate based on race, color, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

title: Accelerate Program (Pega)
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you want, where you will be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join the Accelerate Program and take your professional journey to the next level and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world!
   

  

**Your role**
 In the Accelerate Program, you will experience continuous growth with the flexibility to advance through specialized training within Pega and certifications, focusing on upskilling. The Accelerate Program includes tailored training to enhance your Pega skills, alongside mentorship opportunities from experienced consultants at Capgemini. In addition, you will receive training in sales to strengthen your ability to support customers during their digital transformation, as well as leadership training designed to develop your ability to lead teams and drive initiatives effectively.
   

  

 You will have the opportunity to collaborate closely with our partner Pega. Specialize in developing and optimizing business process management solutions using Pega. Ensure streamlined operations and improved customer experiences, establishing yourself as a key expert in this transformative technology.
   

  

 Engage in innovative projects that will immerse you in the latest technologies and methodologies. Explore diverse roles and gain invaluable global exposure by working on international projects, with teams from around the world!
   

  

**Your profile**
* Two to five years of experience in software development
* Relevant academic degree
* The ambition to grow within Pega
* Fluency in Swedish is required
* Previous experience in the public sector is considered an advantage
* Experience as a consultant is considered an advantage


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* Customized Pega training program, delivered in close collaboration with our prominent Pega partner
* Opportunity to work with the latest technologies across exciting projects for major global clients, alongside leading partners
* Dedicated mentor support, acting as a sounding board throughout your journey, while you gain experience from diverse projects
* Access to a multinational network of 420,000+ industry experts, plus 250,000 courses and certifications to support continuous learning
* Full-time position with a competitive, market-aligned salary under collective agreements, combined with a strong focus on work-life balance and personal growth inside and outside the office


**Application**
 We apply a continuous selection process, so we encourage you to submit your application as soon as possible. As part of our recruitment process, identity verification will be conducted through inspection of your ID card, and background checks may be carried out as required. We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is an AI-powered global business and technology transformation partner, delivering tangible business value. We imagine the future of organizations and make it real with AI, technology and people. With our strong heritage of nearly 60 years, we are a responsible and diverse group of 420,000 team members in more than 50 countries. We deliver end-to-end services and solutions with our deep industry expertise and strong partner ecosystem, leveraging our capabilities across strategy, technology, design, engineering and business operations. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

 Make it real | www.capgemini.com
   

  

 Short Description

title: Postdoktor inom formell verifiering av protokoll och säker kompilering
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Avdelningen för nätverk och systemteknik vid Kungliga Tekniska högskolan (KTH) utlyser en postdoktoral forskartjänst finansierad av Wallenberg AI, Autonomous Systems and Software Program (WASP). Vi söker en mycket motiverad och skicklig forskare med stark bakgrund inom formella metoder för säkerhet, med inriktning mot antingen formell verifiering av säkerhetsprotokoll eller säker kompilering, till vår dynamiska forskargrupp.
   

  

 Den idealiska kandidaten har expertis inom formella metoder och minst ett av följande områden: verifiering av säkerhets- och kryptografiska protokoll, symbolisk och beräkningsbaserad säkerhetsanalys eller kompilatorkorrekthet och bevarande av säkerhetsegenskaper. Erfarenhet av bevisassistenter och automatiska verifieringsverktyg (t.ex. Coq, Isabelle/HOL, Tamarin, ProVerif) samt SMT-lösare är mycket meriterande och kommer att ses som en fördel.
   

  

 Utöver att leda egna forskningsprojekt kommer den framgångsrika kandidaten att arbeta med att utveckla analysramverk för att utvärdera och bevisa säkerhetsegenskaper hos protokoll och program samt etablera end-to-end-garantier längs hela kompilationskedjan. Arbetet innefattar att bidra med nya forskningsidéer, utveckla skalbara verktyg och samarbeta med andra forskare i gruppen och med externa samarbetspartners.
   

  

 Vår växande forskargrupp består för närvarande av 4 doktorander, 2 postdoktorer och 1 biträdande lektor, och har tagit fram modeller, teorier och verktyg som har publicerats på flera ledande konferenser (CAV’20, CCS’23, ISCA’22, SP’24, CSF’25). Vi finansieras av flera forskningsfinansiärer och företag, inklusive WALP, Intel och Amazon.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Krav**
* Avlagd doktorsexamen eller utländsk examen som bedöms motsvara en doktorsexamen. Detta behörighetskrav ska vara uppfyllt senast vid tidpunkten då anställningsbeslutet fattas.
* Som person är du en självständig och drivande forskare med stark bakgrund inom formella metoder för säkerhet.
* Du har dokumenterad vetenskaplig skicklighet inom minst ett av de aktuella forskningsområdena.
* Du har en stark publikationslista i välrenommerade internationella konferenser och tidskrifter.
* Du kan formulera och driva egna forskningsidéer samt bidra till gemensamma projekt inom gruppen.
* Du kommunicerar vetenskapliga resultat tydligt, både skriftligt och muntligt, och du trivs med att arbeta i en internationell forskningsmiljö.


**Meriterande**
* Vid sista ansökningsdag högst tre år sedan doktorsexamen eller en utländsk examen som bedöms motsvara doktorsexamen avlades.
* Medvetenhet om mångfalds- och likabehandlingsfrågor, med särskilt fokus på jämställdhet.
* Du är självständig i ditt arbete och har lätt för att samarbeta med andra.


 Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Bli en del av KTH
   

  

 KTH formar framtiden genom utbildning, forskning och innovation. Som ett ledande internationellt tekniskt universitet spelar vi en aktiv roll i att driva och medverka i omställningen till ett hållbart samhälle. Här erbjuds du möjligheten att växa och utvecklas på en kreativ och dynamisk arbetsplats med goda arbetsvillkor och förmåner. Jämställdhet, mångfald och lika villkor är en kvalitetsfråga och en självklar del av KTH:s värdegrund som universitet och statlig myndighet.
   

  

 Läs mer om våra förmåner och hur det är att arbeta och utvecklas på KTH.
   

  

 Fackliga representanter
   

  

 Kontaktuppgifter till fackliga representanter.
   

  

 Ansökan
   

  

 Du ansöker via KTH:s rekryteringssystem. Du som sökande har huvudansvaret för att din ansökan är komplett när den skickas in.
   

  

**Ansökan Ska Innehålla**
* CV inklusive relevant yrkeserfarenhet och kunskap.
* Kopia av examensbevis och betyg från dina tidigare universitetsstudier. Översättningar till engelska eller svenska om de ursprungliga dokumenten inte utfärdas på något av dessa språk.
* Kortfattad redogörelse för varför du vill bedriva forskning, dina akademiska intressen och hur de relaterar till dina tidigare studier och framtida mål. max 2 sidor lång.


 Ansökan ska vara KTH tillhanda senast sista ansökningsdagen vid midnatt, CET/CEST (Central European Time/Central European Summer Time).
   

  

 Om anställningen
   

  

 Anställningen gäller tillsvidare, dock längst två år
   

  

 En anställning som postdoktor är en tidsbegränsad meriteringsanställning med huvudinriktning mot forskning avsedd som ett första karriärsteg efter disputation.
   

  

 Övrigt
   

  

 För information om behandling av personuppgifter i samband med rekrytering.
   

  

 Det kan förekomma att en anställning hos KTH är placerad i säkerhetsklass. Om så är fallet för just denna anställning görs en säkerhetsprövning av sökande i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) efter samtycke. I dessa fall är en förutsättning för anställning att sökande blir godkänd efter säkerhetsprövning.
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av platsannonser.

title: Senior Account Executive - Sweden
description:
**Company Description**
**About CyberArk** 
 :
   

  

 CyberArk (NASDAQ: CYBR), is the global leader in Identity Security. Centered on privileged access management, CyberArk provides the most comprehensive security offering for any identity – human or machine – across business applications, distributed workforces, hybrid cloud workloads and throughout the DevOps lifecycle. The world’s leading organizations trust CyberArk to help secure their most critical assets. To learn more about CyberArk, visit our CyberArk blogs or follow us on X, LinkedIn or Facebook.
   

  

**Job Description**
 As an Enterprise Account Executive at CyberArk, you are responsible for driving new business and expanding existing accounts within your territory. As a trusted advisor to customers you will lead complex sales cycles, orchestrate cross-functional teams, and deliver CyberArk’s Identity Security solutions in a way that creates lasting business impact for enterprise customers. This is a consultative sales role, not product pitching, requiring you to uncover business problems, map them to CyberArk’s value, and drive outcomes through a strategic engagement approach. You will work with internal and external partners and leverage AI-enabled sales tools to engage, influence, and win.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Ownership of Full Sales Cycle & Forecasting:**
* Lead end-to-end sales processes, from prospecting and qualification through to close, ensuring alignment with customer business outcomes and CyberArk’s value proposition, with full accountability for quota attainment.
* Own and manage pipeline and forecast with rigor; apply structured methodologies like MEDDPICC and leverage tools (Salesforce, Clari, Gong, Demandbase) to drive pipeline health, deal progression, and forecasting accuracy.
* Drive business outcomes with a strong bias for action across negotiation, procurement, and day-to-day business operations.


**Deliver Business Outcomes Through Consultative Selling:**
* Understand customer priorities and translate CyberArk’s platform into tangible business value and technical relevance.
* Lead with insights, not features—this is a solution-led, outcome-driven role.


**Build Executive and Multi-Level Relationships:**
* Engage and influence stakeholders at multiple levels including CxO, security leaders, procurement, and technical teams.
* Develop champions and foster account trust that supports long-term growth and expansion.


**Orchestrate the Broader Sales Team:**
* Collaborate closely with Solution Sales Specialists and internal teams to penetrate new areas and co-sell across CyberArk’s portfolio.
* Take ownership of the deal strategy while leveraging specialist knowledge and support resources.


**Work Across the Ecosystem:**
* Drive collaboration with channel partners, GSIs, hyperscalers, and alliances to extend reach and strengthen execution.
* Co-create plans with ecosystem partners that support joint pipeline growth and account penetration.


**Territory Planning and Execution:**
* Own your territory strategy and build comprehensive account plans for key targets.
* Identify whitespace, drive expansion, and ensure alignment with CyberArk’s growth goals.


**Use of AI-Enabled Sales Tools:**
* Leverage tools like Gong and Demandbase to extract insights, personalize outreach, and increase sales productivity.


**Market Insight and Domain Knowledge:**
* Stay on top of cybersecurity trends, competitor movements, and customer challenges to position CyberArk as a strategic partner


**Qualifications**
**Sales and Commercial Acumen:**
* Proven track record of successfully closing complex enterprise deals in cybersecurity or enterprise SaaS.
* Demonstrated ability to grow new logos and expand within existing customers.
* Outcome-oriented with strong commercial judgment and quota ownership mindset.


**Domain Expertise:**
* Familiarity with cybersecurity principles including identity security, PAM, IAM, Zero Trust, and compliance-driven selling.
* Ability to understand business and technical use cases and convert them into solution opportunities.


**Channel and Ecosystem Experience:**
* Experience working with channel partners, cloud providers, and GSIs to co-sell and accelerate go-to-market execution.


**Interpersonal Strengths:**
* Strong executive presence and influencing skills across all customer levels.
* Commercial curiosity and the ability to uncover customer pain points through active listening.
* Collaborative, coachable, and resilient with a passion for team-based success.


**Sales Process and Tool Familiarity:**
* Skilled in sales methodologies such as MEDDPICC and Command of the Message.
* Comfortable using Salesforce, Clari, Gong, Demandbase, and other digital selling tools to drive efficiency and insight.


**Additional Information**
 We are proud to foster a diverse and inclusive workplace, where every individual's unique background, perspective, and contribution is celebrated. We believe that by embracing diversity, we drive innovation and create a stronger, more united team. Inclusion is at the heart of who we are and how we succeed. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or disability. Upon conditional offer of employment, candidates are required to complete a comprehensive background check as per our internal policy.
   

  

 CyberArk is an equal opportunities employer. If you would like any special arrangements made for your interview, please inform the EMEA Talent Acquisition team upon your application so that we may take steps to accommodate your needs.

title: Design Engineer
description:
**TL;DR** 
 - We’re seeking exceptional Design Engineers to help build the future of AI. You’ll work closely with both design and engineering to build world-class interfaces that empower the next generation of creators and builders.
   

  

 Why Lovable?
   

  

 Lovable lets anyone build software with plain English. Solopreneurs to Fortune 100 teams use Lovable to transform raw ideas into real products - fast. We’re at the forefront of a foundational shift in software creation, which means you have an unprecedented opportunity to change the way the world works. Over 2 million people in 200+ countries already use Lovable to launch businesses, solve complex problems, and bring their dreams to life. And we’re just getting started.
   

  

 We’re a small, talent-dense team building a generation-defining company from Stockholm. We value high ownership, high velocity and low-ego collaboration. We seek people who care deeply, challenge us, and are driven to build something of lasting impact.
   

  

 What we’re looking for
   

  

* 5+ years of years experience, shipping products users genuinely love
* Portfolio demonstrating sophisticated interactions and thoughtful user affordances required (if you don’t have a portfolio - please check out our other roles!)
* Ability to make smart trade-offs between speed and polish, knowing when to ship and when to refine
* Expertise in React/TypeScript and the broader frontend ecosystem
* Experience translating scrappy explorations into production-ready experiences
* Strong product sense with an eye for detail, accessibility, and usability


 What you’ll do
   

  

 In one sentence: Own and scale the user-facing experience of Lovable products, turning powerful capabilities into intuitive, magical interfaces.
   

  

* Design and build world class product experiences
* Drive front-end execution - pioneering new interaction patterns, micro-animations, and delightful details that elevate the entire experience
* Implement features in React/TypeScript with obsessive attention to detail
* Collaborate with backend, ML, design, and product teams to bring complex features to life in a seamless way
* Explore and iterate on visual designs with designers, translating explorations into scalable, web-native implementations
* Build and maintain reusable components that enhance consistency while enabling creativity across the product


 Our tech stack
   

  

 We're building with tools that both humans and AI love:
   

  

* Frontend: React, Tailwind
* Backend: Golang and Rust
* Cloud: Cloudflare, GCP, AWS, Many LLM providers
* DevOps & Tooling: Github Actions, Grafana, OTEL, , infra-as-code (Terraform)


 And always on the lookout for what's next!
   

  

 How we hire
   

  

* Fill in a short form then jump on an intro call with our design team.
* Show us some of your work you’re really proud of.
* Show us how you approach problems during technical interviews.
* In some cases, we may opt to do paid, trial work.


**About Your Application**
* Please submit your application in English - it’s our company language so you’ll be speaking lots of it if you join
* We treat all candidates equally - if you’re interested please apply through our careers portal

title: Software Engineer (Backend Product Engineer)
description:
**Why Uniplay?** 




 Uniplay is redefining how people learn and grow.
 



  





 We turn corporate training into adaptive, AI-powered games, not lessons, slides, or compliance clicks.
 



  





 Our mission is simple:
 **make corporate learning fun.** 




  





 We’re the world’s first fully game-based learning platform, agent-driven, data-powered, and hyper-personalized.
 



  





 What used to be long lessons, static, predictable, we turn into games that are fun, engaging, and rewarding.
 



  





 Work at Uniplay is fast and runs on high trust, extreme ownership, and relentless optimism.
 **We skip bureaucracy and prefer progress over process.** 




  





 We’re still early but already working with
 **global enterprises** 
 and expanding fast. Game-based learning isn’t a theory anymore – it’s outperforming traditional learning in both engagement and retention.
 



  





 If you want to help build a new category, shape a product that will reach millions, and work with a team that
 **values curiosity over titles** 
 – join us.
 



  





**Trust the fun.** 




 uniplay.io
 



  





 We’re looking for a
 **Software Engineer (Backend Product Engineer)** 
 who loves building fast, scalable systems — the kind that don’t just “work” but
 *elevate* 
 the product. If turning raw AI + data into real-time game logic sounds fun, you’ll probably love it here.
 



  





**The Role** 




 We’re looking for a Software Engineer who loves building systems that actually scale, connect and evolve.
 



  





 It’s about building a living system where humans and agents co-create in real time.
 



  





 You’ll be right at the core, connecting LLMs, orchestration layers and a fast data architecture that powers Uniplay’s adaptive learning engine.
 



  





 We’re a small, sharp team based in Stockholm with a hybrid setup of deep-focus home days and high-energy studio days.
 



  





**What you’ll do** 




 Design, build, and scale the backend and infrastructure behind our AI game engine — real-time, data-driven, adaptive.
 



  





 Develop APIs and orchestration logic that connect multiple LLMs, internal agents, and external services into a unified experience.
 



  





 Collaborate with frontend, design, and AI teams to turn logic and data into fast, elegant user experiences.
 



  





 Own cloud architecture (AWS / GCP) — from deployment pipelines to performance and reliability.
 



  





 Occasionally work in the frontend (React / Next.js) to keep the full stack coherent and flowing.
 



  





 Contributing us build our agentic backbone that empowers AI-native user experiences.
 



 Ship fast, learn faster — and help define what “AI product” means in practice.
 



  





**Who you are** 




**You builds things. You have personal projects, side experiments, or AI prototypes that show your curiosity in action. You are someone who creates, not just only codes.** 




  





 Strong in backend development, APIs, data flow, and infrastructure.
 



  





 Experienced with Node.js (Python is plus), and comfortable navigating between backend and fullstack contexts.
 



  





 Experienced in functional programming — or ready to learn and apply it.
 



 Comfortable with cloud environments (AWS, GCP, or Azure), Infra as Code (IaC) and Event-Driven Architecture.
 



 Experience building applications with foundational models (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini or similar) and how to make them part of real products.
 



  





 Structured under speed — delivers quality even when things are moving fast.
 



  





 Communicative, collaborative, and thrives in autonomous teams with shared ownership.
 



  





 Sees AI as a new co-worker, not a co-pilot.
 



  





**Practical** 



* Hybrid in Stockholm — we value hands-on collaboration and shared creative energy.



  





**Our tech stack:** 



* **Everywhere:** 
 TypeScript, Effect.js
* **Frontend** 
 : React, Next.js
* **Backend:** 
 Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, Kafka
* **Mobile:** 
 React Native (Expo)
* **Cloud:** 
 Cloudflare, AWS, many LLM providers
* **DevOps & Tooling:** 
 Github Actions, n8n, Grafana, OTEL, infra-as-code

title: Developer
description:
Since July 2025, TRATON AB has united R&D efforts for Scania, MAN, and International, working as one team to deliver the world’s best trucks for all our brands. Our values – Customer First, Respect, Team Spirit, Responsibility, and Elimination of Waste – guide everything we do. Together, we are shaping a sustainable future for transportation.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Our unit is responsible for several functions in the engine control unit, ranging from engine and combustion optimization, sustainable emission strategies and engine speed control. We are committed to Traton's ambitious goals of reducing environmental and climate impact. The Unit is responsible for developing functionality to all brand specific organisations including, Scania, MAN and International.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 As a development engineer in our unit, you will be part of all steps in the developing process i.e. concept development, implementation and testing. You will also get the chance to work in both pre-development project as well as you will investigate and solve problems found on the current production software. Some of the tasks that you will be assigned to is:
   

  

  

* Developing new software functionality in our engine management system.
* Testing your functionality in different environments, for example in simulation environment, testbed and in truck.
* Continuous discussions and cooperation with colleagues all around Traton including our brand specific organisations.


 Apart from being developer you will also work as Scrum master for our unit. As Scrum master you will be responsible for:
   

  

  

* Lead our weekly competence group meeting where we initiate work for all our new issues.
* Together with product owners you will be responsible for setting the plans for our teams and keep track of our progress.
* Improving our processes when it comes to planning, quality and delivery precision.


**Your profile**
 We believe that you have a master of science or higher education in mechatronics, computer science, automotive or similar. We believe that;
   

  

  

* You are analytical person that like problem solving,
* You are a team player that enjoy working with other people in the group but also around the whole R&D,
* You are adaptable and enjoy working with both ongoing customizations and also in large future projects.
* You have leading skills and can represent the group in different forums.


 Knowledge that are required:
   

  

  

* Experience in C-programming.
* Experience in engine development.
* Knowledge in Matlab/Simulink.
* Experience in working as a Scrum master.


**We offer**
 Our team is responsible for a wide area of functionality, offering many possible focus areas. The team consists of ten engineers who continuously work together within the unit and together with other parts of Traton R&D.
   

  

 In our team you have a great possibility to realize your own ideas to functionality in our end product. We can offer you a very helpful environment that gives you the possibility to grow as a Scrum master and as a function developer.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-12-30. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 Johan Malgerud, unit manager, Johan.Malgerud@scania.com
   

  

 I look forward to your application!
   

  

 LI-Hybrid

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Är du en kreativ fullstackutvecklare med några års erfarenhet av Java? Drivs du av att göra nytta och påverka samhället på riktigt? Då kan det här vara en roll för dig.
   

  

****Om tjänsten****
 E-hälsomyndigheten har i uppdrag att bygga upp en nationell digital infrastruktur inom hälsa, vård och omsorg för att stödja och möjliggöra informationsdelning av hälsodata mellan vårdens system. Infrastrukturen ska bidra till att öka kvaliteten i vården, att förbättra patientsäkerheten, att stärka patientens ställning och att minska den administrativa bördan för hälso- och sjukvårdens medarbetare.
   

  

 I rollen som fullstackutvecklare hos oss arbetar du i ett agilt team i tätt samarbete med utredare och verksamhetsspecialister som löpande levererar värde. Du arbetar med testdriven utveckling och testautomatisering som en naturlig del av din roll som systemutvecklare, vilket gör detta till en roll för dig som uppskattar en bredd i dina arbetsuppgifter.
   

  

 Du utvecklar portaler som blir navet för integrationer och e-tjänster som gör vården mer sammanhållen och effektiv. Vi står inför komplexa och meningsfulla utmaningar där din kompetens som fullstackutvecklare gör verklig skillnad – både för andra utvecklare och för vårdpersonal som varje dag hjälper människor. Här får du arbeta med modern teknik, påverka arkitekturval och skapa lösningar som används i hela vårdsystemet.
   

  

****Om dig****
 Du är en person som brinner för tekniken och hur den effektivt kan användas. Det du inte kan lär du dig gärna och du kommer med idéer på nya tekniska lösningar och metoder. Som person trivs du när du får samarbeta med andra, du tar stort eget ansvar för att driva ditt arbete framåt och du är analytisk.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* akademisk utbildning inom it, mjukvara eller programmering alternativt flerårig aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av liknande arbetsuppgifter
* minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet som fullstackutvecklare där Java varit det huvudsakliga programspråket
* minst två års arbetslivserfarenhet av systemutveckling där även grafiska användargränssnitt (front end) varit en del av vad som levererats
* minst två års erfarenhet av arbete där testning och testautomatisering är en integrerad del av kodens livscykelhantering.


**Det är meriterande för tjänsten om du har:**
* goda kunskaper inom webbutvecklingens kärnteknologier för att skapa responsiva och användarvänliga gränssnitt
* erfarenhet av utveckling med Vue.js
* erfarenhet av utveckling med Quarkus, Spring Boot eller annat motsvarande modernt Java-ramverk för mikrotjänster
* erfarenhet av arbete med containerbaserade tekniker som exempelvis Docker, Kubernetes och OpenShift
* erfarenhet av att publicera och bidra till öppen källkod.


****Vad erbjuder vi?****
 E-hälsomyndigheten är en myndighet i tillväxt och vi driver utvecklingen av nationell digital infrastruktur inom hälsa, vård och omsorg. Vi skapar förutsättningar för digitala tjänster och lösningar för både privatpersoner och professioner inom hälso- och sjukvård, apotek och socialtjänst. Vi arbetar för att hälsodata ska bli tillgängliga i hela vårdkedjan.
   

  

 Vi är cirka 600 medarbetare i Kalmar och Stockholm. Hos oss finns möjlighet att göra skillnad i en innovativ miljö med trevliga och kompetenta arbetskamrater. Alla medarbetare har förtroendearbetstid och kan arbeta delvis på distans. Läs mer om E-hälsomyndigheten som arbetsplats: Jobba hos oss
   

  

****Är du intresserad?****
 Frågor angående tjänsten besvaras av enhetschef Åsa Stridsman, 010-106 0979.
   

  

 Frågor angående rekryteringsprocessen besvaras av HR-specialist Dorothea Lockman, 010-175 3741.
   

  

 Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan och cv via vårt rekryteringsverktyg senast den 18 januari. Ladda gärna upp examensbevis, betyg och intyg som är relevanta för tjänsten i samband med din ansökan. Under perioden 22/12-6/1 har vi begränsad möjlighet att svara på frågor.
   

  

 Anställningen är tillsvidare med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträde snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Placeringsort för anställningen är Kalmar eller Stockholm. Arbetet kan innebära tjänsteresor, främst mellan Kalmar och Stockholm.
   

  

 En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. Därför kan vi komma att behöva genomföra en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585). För en del arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

 Om du har beslut om skyddade personuppgifter, kontakta den HR-specialist som finns namngiven i annonsen.
   

  

 Läs mer om oss på www.ehalsomyndigheten.se
   

  

 Rekryteringen hanteras av E-hälsomyndighetens HR-enhet och vi undanber oss säljsamtal från rekryteringsföretag och annonssäljare.

title: Fullstack Engineer - Security
description:
**TL;DR** 
 We’re looking for a Fullstack Engineer with a passion for security. You’ll ship core product features while designing and implementing security enhancements across our stack, empowering millions of users to create safely and confidently.
   

  

**Why Lovable?**
 Lovable enables anyone to build software with plain English. From solopreneurs to Fortune 100 teams, millions use Lovable to turn ideas into real products—fast. We’re leading a foundational shift in software creation, giving you a unique opportunity to shape the digital world. With over 2 million users in 200+ countries, our impact is global—and we’re just getting started.
   

  

 We’re a small, high-caliber team in Stockholm, building a generation-defining company. We value high ownership, rapid iteration, and low-ego collaboration. We seek people who care deeply about their craft, challenge us, and are driven to make a lasting impact.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
* 5+ years of experience building and shipping full-stack products, with a strong track record of delivering high-quality code.
* Proficiency in modern frontend (React/TypeScript) and backend (Golang, Rust) development.
* Solid understanding of systems design, performance tradeoffs, and scalable architecture.
* Experience designing and implementing application security features. such as authentication, authorization, secure data handling, and threat mitigation.
* Strong product sense and the ability to make well-reasoned technical decisions, balancing speed with long-term security and reliability.
* Bonus: Experience with secure coding practices, code reviews for security, or contributing to security-focused projects.


**What You’ll Do**
* Design, build, and maintain features across the stack, frontend, backend, and infrastructure.
* Implement and enhance security features (e.g., auth, secure APIs, data protection) as a core part of product development.
* Take responsibility for architecture, implementation, deployment, and iteration with a focus on secure, scalable solutions.
* Work closely with other engineering teams to translate capabilities into secure, intuitive user experiences.
* Advocate for secure coding practices, conduct code reviews with a security lens, and help raise the security bar across the team.
* Influence our technical direction, engineering culture, and product strategy with a security-first mindset.
* Secure the last piece of software.


**Our Tech Stack**
* Frontend: React and Typescript.
* Backend: Golang and Rust.
* Cloud: Cloudflare, GCP, AWS, Modal, multiple LLM providers.
* DevOps & Tooling: Github Actions, Grafana, OTEL, infra-as-code (Terraform).
* Data: Clickhouse, Firestore, Spanner, BigQuery.


 And we’re always exploring what’s next!
   

  

**How To Apply**
* Please submit your application in English—our working language at Lovable.
* We’re committed to fair and equal treatment for all candidates. If you’re interested, apply via our careers portal

title: Javautvecklare
description:
På Pensionsmyndigheten pågår just nu en spännande förändringsresa i att utveckla vårt nya förmånssystem från grunden vilket innebär en hel del nyutveckling. Nu söker vi flera Javautvecklare till Stockholm som är samarbetsinriktade och trivs med att arbeta i team!
   

  

**Om jobbet**
 Som Javautvecklare hos oss kommer du att ingå i ett team och arbetar utifrån en teambaserad organisation enligt det agila ramverket SAFe. Teamen hos oss är tvärfunktionella och självgående för att kunna hantera alla delar av utvecklingskedjan.
   

  

 Så här beskriver ett av våra team sig själv:
   

  

 ”Vi är ett självorganiserat hybridteam som jobbar enligt det agila ramverket SAFe. Vi arbetar i framkant med tekniska utmaningar som berör utveckling av nästa generations pensionssystem, baserat på mikrotjänster. Vi underlättar kvalitetssäkring av tjänster och system samt möjliggör kontinuerliga leveranser till test och produktion (CD/CI). Utöver det är vår vision att driva innovation och ta ansvar för arkitekturen genom att vara ledande inom vårt område. Tillsammans med teamet kommer du ha möjlighet att utvecklas och arbeta med teknik i framkant.”
   

  

**Din profil**
 Som person gillar du teamarbete där man delar med sig av kunskaper och lär av varandra. Du säger din mening, lyssnar på andras och är också bekväm i samarbete på distans då vi arbetar i distribuerade team. Du är också en problemlösare som gillar att omsätta komplexa krav till strukturerad kod och vill delta i att leda oss rätt i teknik och metodik.
   

  

 Vi bryr oss om vår kultur och hur vi tillsammans påverkar vår gemensamma arbetsplats. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* är utbildad systemvetare, dataingenjör eller har skaffat dig motsvarande kunskaper på annat sätt
* har god Javakompetens och arbetslivserfarenhet som javautvecklare
* har erfarenhet av och trivs med att arbeta i agila team
* behärskar det svenska språket väl


 Det är meriterande om du:
   

  

* har erfarenhet av Spring Boot
* har erfarenhet av REST-tjänster och JMS
* har erfarenhet av byggprocessverktyg som Jenkins
* är väl bekant med något testramverk, exempelvis JUnit, Cucumber
* har erfarenhet av att arbeta med kod- och byggverktyg som Git och Maven
* har erfarenhet av en modern IDE, gärna IntelliJ


**Vi erbjuder**
 Ett myndighetsuppdrag som är viktigt på riktigt! En arbetsplats där vi värnar om att våra medarbetare ska ha en god balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi tillämpar hybridarbetssätt med möjlighet till distansarbete och på kontoret utifrån en överenskommelse med arbetsgivare. Som statligt anställd har du även goda anställningsvillkor och ett förmånspaket med friskvård, flexibel arbetstid, lediga klämdagar samt goda semester- och pensionsvillkor.
   

  

 Vårt kontor i Stockholm ligger i nära anslutning till Hornstulls tunnelbanestation där vi sitter i ljusa moderna lokaler.
   

  

 Du kan läsa mer om våra förmåner och hur det är att jobba hos oss här.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid och vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Anställningen kan komma att placeras i säkerhetsklass.
   

  

**Din ansökan**
 Vi kan komma att använda oss av arbetspsykologiska tester.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter kontakta rekryterande chef som hjälper dig med din ansökan.
   

  

 Vi strävar efter en jämn könsfördelning och ser mångfald som en styrka och välkomnar därför sökande med olika bakgrund.
   

  

 Inför rekryteringsarbetet har vi tagit ställning till annonskanaler och marknadsföring. Vi undanber oss därför ytterligare kontakt med media-/annonsförsäljare, rekryteringssajter och liknande.
   

  

 Pensionsmyndigheten ansvarar för den allmänna pensionen och informerar om hela pensionen. Varje år betalar vi ut cirka 415 miljarder kronor till 2,3 miljoner pensionärer, genomför cirka 911 000 fondbyten och skickar ut 8 miljoner orange kuvert. Vi har ca 25 miljoner digitala kundkontakter per år. Vi är cirka 1700 medarbetare på åtta orter, från Luleå i norr till Halmstad i söder.
   

  

 #viktigtpåriktigt
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: PSL 2025-188 | Kontakt: Lars Nordström, Gruppchef , Ulrika Eriksson, Gruppchef , | Facklig företrädare: Michael Karlsson, ST 010-4543427, Rickard Rundgren, ST 010-4543115, Linda Modin, Saco-s 010-4543336, | Publicerat: 2025-11-27 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2026-01-11

title: Experienced SAP S/4HANA consultant - Financial accounting
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible.


At Packaged Based Solutions (PBS) Nordics, a Capgemini unit, we specialize in ERP transformation for public and private sectors, using platforms like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS to help organizations achieve operational excellence and strategic growth. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client base, we guide clients through seamless ERP transformations that deliver lasting value.


Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, inclusive world!

**Your Role**


As an experienced finance SAP S/4HANA consultant, you will be responsible for optimizing end-to-end financial accounting processes, delivering client value in complex and innovative SAP programs for leading global organizations. This including:

* Lead the design, configuration, and implementation of SAP S/4HANA Finance, ensuring alignment with business requirements and best practices.
* Provide strategic advice and expertise to clients on SAP S/4HANA Finance solutions, including General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Asset Accounting, Controlling, and/or Treasury.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate SAP S/4HANA Finance with other SAP modules (e.g., SD, MM, PP, WM, PM) and external systems.
* Manage and mentor junior consultants, fostering their professional development and ensuring high-quality project delivery.
* Stay current with industry trends, the latest developments in SAP S/4HANA Finance, and emerging technologies to continuously enhance service delivery.

 **Your Profile**

* At least 5 years of hands-on experience and proven track record in implementing SAP finance solutions in a complex environment.
* Strong understanding of end-to-end finance business processes and the ability to align SAP solutions with business objectives.
* Ideally, you have experience from being a team-lead for a finance area within a global SAP S/4HANA implementation. You are comfortable facilitating workshops and secure aligning between IT and the business.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.


**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**

* Freedom to shape your work, manage your time with hybrid flexibility, and have the space to be creative, innovate, and make a real difference.
* A variety of social and wellness activities, from sports and health programs to cultural events and art initiatives, designed to bring employees together and enrich work life.
* An inspiring environment where you can accelerate your growth through continuous learning, professional certifications, and world-class programs from Udemy, Harvard Manager Mentor, and our trusted partner learnings. Collaborate with a nordic and global network of experts, gain cutting-edge insights, and stay ahead in the latest technologies and business practices.
* An extensive benefits package, including parental benefits, occupational and flex pension, private insurance, preventive healthcare, and more.
**Application**  

In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis.


As part of our recruitment process, identity verification will be conducted through inspection of your ID card, and background checks may be carried out as required.


**About Capgemini**  

Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.


Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**Platform Engineer**

  

We are the newly established Data Platform Services team within Telia Technology Analytics Platforms unit. Our mission is to deliver top-tier, purpose-built, and value-driven capabilities in Data and AI to Telia. We believe that enhancing analytical capabilities is crucial for boosting Telia’s operational efficiency, improving our product offerings, and elevating customer experience. To accomplish this, we provide a unified set of tools designed to meet the needs of every country.
  

  

My name is Mikko Olin, Head of Data Platform Services, and I am seeking team member who is enthusiastic about collaborating closely with our on-premises open-source data Lakehouse, Arcus, in Sweden. Arcus is our next-generation analytics platform, enabling in-country analytics with Lakehouse capabilities. It is built entirely on open-source technology with dedicated hardware and extensive GPU computing power. Our latest iteration supports near real-time use cases, ML Ops, relational databases (Postgres), and GenAI.
  

  

**Is this you?**  

  

You excel at analyzing complex problems, articulating suggested solutions, developing them, and collaborating with colleagues when needed. You take ownership of your responsibilities and are an excellent communicator.
  

  

**Your personality:**

* Team player
* Self-motivated with learning mindset
* Understand business value and demonstrate it in implemented solutions
Good storytelling skills  
* 

  

**We would like you to have experience from some of the below:**

* Python
* Managing Kubernetes deployments and infrastructure
* Experience with Apache Spark, Apache Airflow and Trino
* IAC using Helm and Ansible
* Setting up CI/CD pipelines
GitHub & GitHub Actions  
* 

  

**Bonus if you also have experience from:**

* Setting up data analytics platforms using cloud native components in Kubernetes
* Nvidia AI stack
* DBT (data build tool)
Data warehouse & analytics background  
* 

  

**We are more than a workplace**  

  

Join Telia and our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
  

  

**Interested?**  

  

If you fancy joining our team, don’t hesitate to apply! If you want to know more about the job, reach out to Mikko Olin, mikko.olin@teliacompany.com
  

  

We look forward to receiving your application and to make sure that your personal data is kept safely, we kindly ask you to apply through our recruitment system. We are not able to handle resumes via e-mail or equivalent. Selection will take place on an ongoing basis and this position might be filled before the application deadline. **Application deadline is 2026-01-08**  

  

**Join us and let's make better happen - together!**
